document.full_text: libyan rebels resumed their offensive on friday by massing heavier weapons in an attack on this eastern oil town, but were repulsed in the fading light of afternoon and backtracked along a main road under fire.
document.title: at war: rebel attack on brega ends in stalemate
lines_and_colors: libyan rebels resumed their offensive on friday by massing heavier weapons in an attack on this eastern oil town, but were repulsed in the fading light of afternoon and backtracked along a main road under fire.
